message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1600000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to both of us.  Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to go up to $1400000 at this time.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to me. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1400000 is unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price. How about we split the difference and go with $1500000? This would be a fair price for both of us and allow us to close the deal.
